title: Interpretation of a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dog in a dream: There are many situations that a dreamer can see around a dog in a dream, and the dog can be domestic or wild, and therefore the connotations of the dream change with it. Our next topic.Interpretation of a dog in a dreamIf you see that you are offering food to a small dog and a pet dog, the interpretation shows that you are providing services and nice things to those around you, that is, you are trying to alleviate people’s fears and make life more comfortable and simple. For them, while if you see the dog attacking you and trying to tear your clothes, the meaning emphasizes many problems that hurt you, it is trying to make you sad and lose you. It is not a good meaning in the dream world to see a dog biting you and can hurt you, as it is affected by the crises that happen to it during The current period and it turns into conflicts and harsh and harmful matters. Imam Al-Sadiq says: A person must have good things and good characteristics. If he sees a dog in his dream, it is expected that he will commit bad behavior that can harm himself or harm those around him, and this makes people avoid him and do not want to deal with him. Interpretation of a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin. One of the meanings of seeing a pet dog according to Ibn Sirin is that it is a symbol of the presence of support for sleep, so there are people around him who are honest with him and love to see him in a good and happy condition. When you hear the sound of a dog in a dream and it barks loudly, the interpretation does not portend good happiness, but rather shows someone who is trying to harm you and spoil your reputation with his evil and false words. Sometimes many black dogs are a sign of malicious actions and many sins that a person commits in many ways in his life and can lead him to great sadness and troubles later. Interpretation of a dog in a dream for a single womanWhen a dog appears in a dream for a single woman, dream scholars explain some of its interpretations. If she sees that she is white and beautiful and manipulates her, this indicates joy in the near life and getting rid of false people who influence negatively. While watching the brown dog, she should think about her relationship with those around her who envy her and hurt her greatly because of his ugly look at her. Sometimes she sees a girl in a dream A black dog chases her, and some of them get up, hence the many obstacles she faces. Beating it indicates kindness and making the right decisions in her life that will get her out of sadness and stress. Interpretation of a dog in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a dog in her dream and its color is black, this may indicate many problems that she always faces, whether during work or married life, So the conditions in which you live will be unpleasant and you hope to get rid of severe crises affecting him, including financial. Being chased by a black dog can be an affirmation of great sadness. Anxiety is the result of envy and lack of abundant worship. One of the meanings of seeing a small dog in a dream is that it is a good omen for a woman to gain comfort and success in most circumstances and matters, but if the small dog attacks her, this may indicate the presence of an enemy around her. . She is malicious and has a bad attitude and she must get rid of it along with the problem

title: Interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream for girls

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream. Gray hair is one of the most annoying things that those who suffer from it hate, as they fear it reaching those who are in the youth stage. . It indicates old age, disability, and loss of health, and gray hair is the change in the color of black, brown, or yellow hair to white as you get older. Gray hair can appear in some people at an early and young age, and this can be due to genetic factors or psychological health reasons, This vision is considered one of the disturbing visions that many people feel during their sleep, which causes them anxiety. And emphasis, so we mention its various interpretations according to what was mentioned in the encyclopedia about dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream Ibn Sirin says about seeing gray hair in a dream: Gray hair in a dream indicates anxiety, sadness, and distress that the dreamer is going through. The number and density of white hair symbolizes The dream indicates the amount of anxiety in the dreamer’s life, and the more gray the color in the dream, the more problems the dreamer has. Graying of the dreamer’s head indicates great misfortunes and may be a sign of the death of a loved one for the dreamer. A woman’s whole head turning gray in a dream indicates her husband’s immorality, And if he is righteous, he will marry another woman. Interpretation of a dream about gray hair for girls: According to what was narrated by the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin in a dream about gray hair for unmarried women, he narrated the following: White hair in a dream symbolizes the dignity and respect of those around her, as well as longevity. Gray hair in a person’s hair indicates in The dream indicates a close marriage with a good man with whom you will find happiness and stability. Interpretation of gray hair in a dream for a married woman. There are many indications that she sees a married woman with gray hair in her dream. We mention them in the following points: The gray hair of a woman’s head in a dream indicates her husband’s success in his work and his very blessed life. White hair on a married woman’s body symbolizes a lot of debt. The white lock on the front of a married woman’s head in a dream shows her husband’s view of others, and a lack of faith and honesty. Seeing the white lock of a married woman’s hair in the middle of her head may indicate committing sins and transgressions, but plucking it indicates On repentance and good circumstances. In the event that the wife becomes ill, and the hair on her body turns white in a dream, it is an unpleasant vision that indicates the imminent death of the dreamer. Gray hair on a married woman symbolizes poverty and illness and may indicate divorce. Interpretation of a dream about gray hair in the beardThe following is an interpretation Seeing white hair with a beard in a dream: The whiteness of beard hair in a dream in a black Eden indicates the dreamer’s devastation in his religion and wealth. The small whiteness of the dreamer’s beard symbolizes that God will bless him with a male child. The whiteness of the beard indicates the return of an absent loved one from travels. The whiteness of a man’s beard in a dream Honorable and tall in standing, especially if the shape of the white beard is decorated and beautiful. Interpretation of seeing gray hair on the front of the head There are many indicators of the appearance of gray hair on the front of the head, which we mention in the following points: Gray hair on the front of the head indicates loss

title: Interpretation of a dream about my friend leaving me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of my friend who left me in a dream, dear reader, you can learn the interpretation of the dream of my friend who left me in a dream according to the interpretations of any scholars and not personal interpretations, all of this and much more. Interpretation of the dream of my friend who left me in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of my friend who left me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing someone leaving you in a dream can lead to a plot, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a single girl sees him leaving her, it may express intrigue and anticipation, and God knows best. I know the unseen. When you see someone leaving you, this may indicate that there is a problem, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my friend’s brother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing my friend’s brother in a dream could indicate goodness and happiness, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, seeing my friend’s brother in a dream may express anxiety. Regarding something related to your friend’s brother, and God knows the unseen. When you see my friend’s brother in a dream, this may be evidence that you are thinking about your friend’s brother, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my friend with a young man in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my friend with a young man in a dream. Perhaps seeing my friend with her lover will lead to love. And God knows the unseen, as it may indicate his love for his girlfriend and his attachment to her, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her friend with her lover, then perhaps she is interested in her, and God knows best. Also, seeing the dreamer dating her friend and her lover may indicate the loss of her friend, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s father in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father’s father. My friend in a dream, seeing a friend’s father could indicate kindness, and God knows best. Where if the dreamer sees his friend’s father happy in a dream, it may express happiness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his friend’s father sad, this may lead to undesirable things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Where it may indicate Concern, and God knows everything that is not seen, was the interpretation of a dream about my friend’s brother getting engaged to me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my friend’s brother getting married to me in a dream. Seeing your friend’s brother’s brother may indicate changes, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the participation of people he knows can indicate good news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as he may express what you receive of news that makes you happy, and God knows everything that is not seen. If an unmarried girl sees her engagement to her teacher It may express her superiority, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my friend’s son in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my friend’s son in a dream. Perhaps seeing the birth of my friend means getting rid of sadness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees the birth of her friend, it may mean that she will get rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. When I see My friend gives birth to a boy in a dream, it could be a sign of money, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the birth of her friend’s son, this may indicate inheritance, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my mother with a child in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about taking off the hijab for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing taking off the niqab in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing the niqab and she is beautiful. This dream indicates that she will reach the highest levels of success, God willing. The dream of an unmarried girl taking off her hijab is considered a dream. It seems that it will be really good. There comes a reason. Her happiness is if she is forced to take off that hula and scream loudly. Washing the niqab in an unmarried woman’s dream may be a sign that she will get rid of all the problems that disturb her comfort. She will also achieve many achievements that will make her more proud of the family and family. Leaving her wearing the niqab to sleep is just a sign One about the problems she faces from her family. Because he wants to make a decision, but they are in control in the first place. Buying the niqab in a dream is good for her, God willing, and good news. She will marry a man who will help her achieve her dreams and wishes because he is rich. Seeing the niqab in a dream is for a virgin girl. A symbol that she will communicate with someone who will bring her closer to God. It will always help her maintain her obedience in the coming days, God willing. Seeing the veil for an unmarried girl and losing it in a dream indicates this. It is just a strong warning of the problems that she will face in the coming period. Perhaps losing the veil is a sign of... Far from the path of God. She does many things that do not please Him. The white niqab in her dream is a good sign of her marriage. To a well-to-do man who will help her achieve her dreams, and God knows best. Seeing the white niqab in a dream while a girl is wearing it is a sign that the problems and fears that you will face will soon disappear. Girl A woman buys a colored niqab. Evidence that she will be blessed in life and in many good things. See also: Interpretation of a dream about searching for a veil for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the veil being removed in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a niqab for a married woman is considered a sign that her husband is committed and fair and often makes her happy. Buying a veil from Inside the market in a married woman’s dream. A good sign that she will experience improvement and stability in her physical condition. Their conditions in married life will be better, God willing. Seeing a gift of a new niqab from her husband in her dream indicates the sincere feelings he feels toward her regarding love. The previous dream may indicate To the imminent pregnancy of a woman who suffered from a late pregnancy. Seeing the black niqab in a dream and the woman taking it off indicates that her husband does not treat her kindly and gently, and does not treat her with tenderness and mercy. He should pray a lot to God for his gift until he balances with him. In case of confusion A woman wearing the niqab in a dream. It is considered one of the signs of problems and difficult situations that will go away, thank God, in the coming period. If a married woman sees that the black niqab is impure. It is just a warning of the emergence of problems that will affect her psyche. Here she must be close to God Almighty in prayer, She constantly asks for forgiveness until the calamity is lifted from her. Seeing the veil in a dream for a married woman is a sign of her secrecy and purity. Looking for the veil in her dream is nothing but a sign that she is looking for income. Be consistent with her so that she can

title: Interpretation of a snake entering the vagina in a dream: A snake in the womb in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a snake coming out of the vagina or a snake entering the body through the anus by Ibn Sirin. Seeing snakes is one of the symbols that leave fear in the mind of the beholder. Interpretation of the dream of a snake entering the Gulf. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of a snake as saying that the dream indicates the spread of hostility between the dreamer’s relatives and his family. Seeing a snake can indicate problems between Parents and children, lack of comfort in the family and lack of stability. The dream also indicates that a neighbor has bad intentions and plans to harm you or your family. A dead snake indicates that this evil has been defeated and that your right will be fully attained because God will grant you victory over it. Whoever sees that many snakes are killed In a dream, this indicates the imminent emergence of wars with the enemy and victory over him. Anyone who sees a snake entering or leaving the Gulf indicates the presence of great pressures and disturbances affecting the viewer. The man who sees the snake on his neck and the man cuts the snake into three pieces, this means that he will grant the woman Triple divorce. Whoever sees that a snake is walking behind you and following you, this interprets that there are enemies who are deliberately spying on you and intend to harm you. Whoever sees that a snake is walking with you in your dream, this indicates that the enemies are far from you and you cannot harm the dreamer. Seeing the snake emerging from kisses in a dream is Nasser. Al-Rumaih YouTube Seeing the exit of the YouTube snake

title: Interpretation of iron in a dream

preview.html: Among us if one sees that he is carrying an iron, hammering, eating iron, etc., and these are the reasons for interpretation. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for one girlIf an unmarried girl sees that the house she lives in is made of iron in a dream. The vision indicates strength, longevity and health. It can Interpretation of seeing eating iron in a dream as an unmarried girl. About the problems that she is going through and does not complain about to anyone. When an unmarried girl sees that she sees iron tools in a dream. She has partners and friends who help her in all her affairs. Seeing one’s own hands is for an unmarried girl. It symbolizes that it is iron in a dream. Be harsh and plan for some of the things you are going through in your life, and God knows best. Whereas if he sees that he is changing the window of the house, and ironing it in a dream. The vision can indicate power, authority and money. The dream of bending iron indicates a dream. An unmarried girl. To obey orders without thinking about them, and our eyes indicate listening and obedience to a person. Taking an iron from someone in a dream with one girl. An indication of kindness and nourishment that accompanies extreme hardship. Or a sign of marrying someone you do not love, and God knows best. Watch. Also: Giving a dream key to a married woman. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she is holding an iron. The vision may indicate the need to do things away from abuse and pay attention to raising her children. Iron rust in a dream for a married woman. A sign of evil, or unwanted money. And God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is buying iron. This is an indication of buying a new home in the near future, God willing. Whereas if a married woman sees that she is hitting an iron in a dream. It is an indication of the presence of problems or problems that the dreamer can go through, and God knows best. The highest and most knowledgeable. Interpretation of bending iron for a married woman in a dream. It is about controlling all aspects of her life and making them work for her. Seeing iron striking or whistling in a married woman’s dream can be interpreted. Carrying out tasks related to her internal affairs as much as possible. Seeing iron skewers in a dream for a woman Married woman can symbolize the presence of major family problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing iron in a man’s dream and its meaning When a married man sees iron in a dream, this can lead to many interpretations. Any of these sometimes brings good and sometimes evil. Such as iron bending in a dream The married man. It indicates obedience and strict orders that this man carries out. If the married man sees that he is hitting the iron hard. title: Interpretation of injustice in a dream: seeing an oppressed person in a dream

preview.html: A dream about injustice for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man. If the oppressed person dreamed that I was being oppressed, I screamed from the injustice and injustice. I was dreaming of someone who had wronged me. Someone who wronged Ibn Sirin, and not just injustice in the dream. It is a very bad dream that afflicts the dreamer in a state of extreme sadness, depression, and intense crying, if he sees that he has been wronged in the dream by those close to him or by one of the other people, as injustice is one of the difficult matters that people suffer from in public life. Injustice causes a lot of oppression and sadness to men in public life. Injustice is one of the things that God and His Messenger have forbidden and he has called us not to oppress others and other matters. Interpretation of injustice in a dream Injustice in a dream indicates the acceleration of the demolition and destruction of homes. Whoever sees that he is oppressed in a dream is poor. Whoever dreams that he confesses his sin and then repents to God Almighty. Whoever sees that he is oppressed If someone prays for him, let him beware of the punishment of God Almighty. Whoever sees himself being oppressed prays for his oppressor, and the oppressed person will triumph over the oppressor. Whoever sees that his oppressor is defending him, this is good news, because he has the right to sue. Interpretation of injustice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing injustice in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer will face many failures and sudden disasters in public life, and will fall into very great destruction and distraction, whether at home or at work and various other things. Seeing injustice in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from evil and problems and will have to be careful in all Things in his life. The dreamer’s vision that he fell under the influence of injustice and oppression and exposed them often in the dream is evidence that the dreamer will get rid of one of the sins of his life and become closer to God Almighty. We respect the dreamer’s vision that he is an unjust and tyrannical figure in public life who violates the rights of others. This is evidence of the need to return. To the right path and to stay away from any injustice to others. The dream is a clear message from God Almighty to the dreamer about the need to return. The dreamer also sees in the dream that he is raising his head to the sky and praying to God against the oppressors and those who wronged him. This is evidence that the dreamer will restore his rights in the near future and get rid of all... The darkness that exists. Within limits. Life, because it will become good soon. Also, the dreamer sees himself blaming himself for his injustice in the dream, evidence that the dreamer will return to the right path in the near future and that he will wake up from the slumber of prohibitions and whims, because he will be able to overcome them. Satanic whims in the life he walked in the past period. Seeing the dreamer being unfair to those in the dream is evidence that the dreamer will take a bad path and commit many sins. Interpretation of a prostitute in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that a man has wronged him in any way in terms of Money or honor, the oppressor will compensate him with the same amount of what he wronged, and the oppressed will be victorious, and the oppressor will be exposed to the world and its injustice. He comes, even if he is worthy of kingship, but his punishment is deserved, may God bless him. Interpretation of prostitution in a dream: A disease appears in the dream that descends until something is needed to treat it. Some Gnostics said: With the corruption of the common people, the princes of injustice appear, and with corruption

title: The 30 most important guides to seeing kings in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Complete interpretations of seeing kings in a dreamInterpretation of seeing kings in a dreamWhat the interpreters talked about, they found that the interpretation of a living king differs from a dead king and that an unjust king carries a bad meaning, while a good king refers to a vow, and in this article we will explain to you. And the meaning of shaking hands with the king, sitting with him, wearing his clothes, and other examples mentioned in the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Seeing kings in a dream. The smile of the king or sultan in a dream is good news and an indication of kindness. As for his bad opinion of the priest, it is a warning and a warning. The jurists used to say that if the ruler or king shakes hands with the fortuneteller and smiles at him, then this is a smile of luck and fate for him soon. The king’s threat and his anger towards the dreamer is a sign of God’s wrath due to his unfortunate actions, and perhaps the dream indicates the cruelty of the coming days and the difficulty of their events for the dreamer. Fighting with the king The oppressor in a dream and the dreamer’s victory over him and killing him is evidence of defeating enemies and achieving a higher position at work and in society in general. If a student dreams of the king of his country smiling at him and declaring his success, the scene is honest and explains the dreamer’s superiority. Great work, the end of misery in life, and the removal of debts and drought, from The strongest interpretations of the appearance of a king in a dream. If a good king is seen in a dream and gives the dreamer a reward or new money, the dream heralds the arrival of benefits and the attainment of success. Dreaming about the king or sultan being separated from his wife indicates that he will leave his position and position or be removed from the government and that the task of managing The country will be assigned to someone else. When the dreamer sits with the Sultan and scolds him harshly and directs him with harsh words, this scene indicates problems and disturbances that will make the dreamer’s life miserable. Seeing the dreamer eating from the same plate as the president is a sign that he is imitating him, following his footsteps and approach to life, and perhaps The dreamer gains the same fame and status as this king later on. If the dreamer visits the palace of the king or the president in reality and sees that he is eating his food, this is a good sign that the dreamer will suit the king and marry a woman from his relatives. Seeing kings in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a king Just judges a problem in which the dreamer is involved and shows his innocence, denotes divine justice that the dreamer is happy with, because the symbol of king or authority sometimes indicates the power of the Almighty God and reveals power. From the dreamer. The relationship with his Lord in reality. Sultan, if signs of acceptance and contentment appear in the dreamer, then the sign of the scene is God’s love for the pioneer and the bestowal of many blessings. The married man goes to the king’s palace and enters it easily and enjoys the good things that were in it of food, drink and clothing, then he will receive good food And a happy life, even if he is the head of state. Or he works as an officer in the army and those in his position... as a president or a sultan. If the fortuneteller sees the door of the living sultan’s palace, removed from its place and placed in another place, this indicates that the ruler is entering into a new romantic relationship, that is, that he is marrying a woman other than his wife. .If the Sultan

title: Rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Rain in a dreamRain in a dream brings a lot of good news that will come to the dreamer’s life and that he will enjoy it, and that the coming period in life will witness many good things, and then it is a detailed presentation of all the interpretations that have been given, specifically seeing rain in the dream...so follow usRain In a dream, seeing rain in a dream means that the dreamer will have his share of many special things that happen to the dreamer in his life. In the event that one sees rain in a dream, it means that he has many special things in this world and that he should be happier than he is. It was like this in previous periods. When one sees in a dream that there is light rain coming from time to time, this means that there is a person traveling who the dreamer knows will return soon. Indications of rain in a dream are varied and contain many distinct details that indicate a lot of goodness that It will come to the dreamer in the near future. When one suffers from sadness or hardship and dreams of heavy rain, this symbolizes that improvement will be his lot and that he will find the comfort he was looking for. If the dreamer sees rain falling on him in his dream, it means that he will enjoy various blessings written by God has him in life. Rain after a long period of suffering indicates that the dreamer will get what he wants of good news and benefits as he wants. Heavy rain in a dream means that excellence and progress in life will accompany the dreamer in the coming period. Rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpreted by Imam Ibn Rain in a dream will be seen as a symbol of many good news and good things that will happen to the dreamer. When a person in his dream finds rain falling on the ground, this is a typical indication of the changes that will happen to him and he will be very happy about them, and this will increase his enjoyment of life. Moreover, it foretells This dream is for the dreamer that the future will be good and that the pleasures he wants will be his portion. Seeing heavy rain in a dream means that the dreamer will obtain many benefits and succeed in the work he embarks on. The dream can also symbolize relief from crises and a state of comfort and happiness that will pervade the fortuneteller’s life. By order of the Lord. Rain in a dream for a single woman. Rain in a dream for a single woman means that the dreamer carries many good qualities that make her close to people and they love dealing with them permanently. When a girl sees rain in a dream, it is a good omen of the benefits and good news that will be for her. A lot in life. When a girl dreams that it is raining on her, this indicates that there are many young men who want to communicate with her, but she does not know which one to choose from and she is confused. The presence of rain in a single woman’s dream symbolizes that she will get what she She wants and that there will be a change for the better that will happen in all aspects of her life. Whoever suffers from sadness and sees rain in a dream, this means that comfort and a way out of adversity is near and that life will become better in her eyes. But rain

title: Interpretation of attempted murder in a dream: seeing someone who tried to kill me

preview.html: Attempted murder with a knife, a bullet in the head, escaping without blood, witnessing a crime, someone trying to kill me, death of a single person, to a married woman, from a pregnant woman, to a divorced woman, interpretation of someone trying to kill me, meaning of trying to kill a woman. Who among us does not like to see someone chasing them and trying to kill them? Who among us was not afraid of this nightmare? This dream has many connotations that tend toward negative things that may happen in the dreamer’s real life and confuse feelings of comfort and security. Let us see together the most important interpretations that are spread about “a dream about someone trying to kill me” on this topic. This dream indicates that the dreamer is preoccupied with his problems in real life that constantly disturb his comfort. The dream indicates the dreamer’s pursuit of immoral or illegal actions that harm others and cause them trouble. In This dream indicates the dreamer’s injustice to one of his relatives and his mistreatment. It is the beginning of the dreamer’s surrender to the worries that burden him. But if the killer in the dream is a person known to the dreamer, this indicates the killer’s good intention to provide assistance. This vision may symbolize the dreamer being insulted after he offers him help. “A dream of someone trying to kill me” is evidence of a disaster that will occur in the dreamer’s life and financial situation, putting his life and work in danger. If the killer in the dream succeeds in killing the fortuneteller, this indicates the success of the god in His career and obtaining a promotion. If the killer does not succeed in his work, this indicates the danger that will haunt the fortuneteller during this period. A killer holding a sharp tool in a dream is strength, kindness, and victory over difficulties. Trying to kill someone in a dream means that you are trying to outsmart him or outsmart him. A man's attempt to kill a woman has many meanings, including his pursuit of wealth or money and his pursuit of success. An unmarried woman's attempt to kill a man is evidence of her subconscious thinking about marriage. An attempt to kill an animal, if successful, indicates success in winning the battle of life, and failure in the attempt reflects the feeling of distress or depression that comes from Repeated interruptions in affection and love in general. Interpretation of a dream about the assassination of Waseem Youssef, YouTube
